lead_paragraph: Mamdouh Mahmud Salim attacked a jail guard in Manhattan in 2000, causing the man to lose his left eye and leaving him with severe brain damage.
snippet: Mamdouh Mahmud Salim attacked a jail guard in Manhattan in 2000, causing the man to lose his left eye and leaving him with severe brain damage.

headline.main: Reputed bin Laden Adviser Gets Life Term in Stabbing
headline.seo: Salim, a Reputed bin Laden Adviser, Gets Life Term
headline.print_headline: Reputed bin Laden Adviser Gets Life Term in Stabbing
